DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effectiveness of amlodipine/atorvastatin therapy by assessing the percentage of subjects who reach target blood pressure (BP) and LDL-C targets as defined by their governing guidelines.
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Study Assessing Effectiveness Of Amlodipine/Atorvastatin In Subjects With Hypertension and Dyslipidaemia
DOC.criteria: Patients who are above target LDLC and BP who are eligible for treatment High liver enzymes
